title: Technology-Enhanced Science Inquiry Projects: Participatory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: A pre-service teacher training course exploring elementary science education methodologies in environments equipped with digital devices such as tablets/Chromebooks

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more learning theory-based educational strategies when designing elementary science inquiry activities using technological tools
One digital learning resource incorporating peer evaluation and feedback can be developed through participatory design workshops
Two or more improvements for technology-supported learning design can be proposed by analyzing formative assessment results

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
